title: Terror Attack in Sweden
summary: Trump implied there was a terror attack in Sweden, but there was no such attack.

checks.name: The New York Times
checks.shortQuote: Trump implied there was a terror attack in Sweden, but there was no such attack.

checks.name: The Washington Post
checks.shortQuote: This was a very strange comment. Nothing had happened the night before in Sweden, as Swedes (including former prime minister Carl Bildt) quickly noted.
